title: I want to have a high FPS in every game, but what changes should I do?

replies.body:
There are a lot of factors that affect FPS. If your FPS has been more unstable than it has been in the past, I'd recommend going through our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to ensure the common culprits have been dealt with.

If you have any more information regarding your FPS, it would be mega helpful to share that with me. ^.^
